input.sentences: our group went bowling this weekend .
my friend bowled a strike nearly every time .
we got to pick which colorful ball we wanted .
i went with the dull lightweight one .
bowling shoes are little hotbeds of bacteria from other people 's feet .
output.sentences: My friend and I decided to get out of the house and go bowling last weekend.
She turned out to be a great bowler and got several strikes.
I was more interested in the colorful bowling balls, loud music and the sounds of other bowlers when they got great scores.
I'm a terrible bowler, but I loved my light-weight, bright red, bowling ball.
The only thing I didn't like were the shoes as it was a little gross wearing shoes that had been worn by hundreds of others.
